channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge: Specs, Features, Price, Release Date
item.description: The Galaxy S25 Edge begs the question: Do you want a thin phone or better battery life?

item.title: Top KitchenAid Promo Codes and Coupons
item.description: Get $240 off select appliances, 15% off most regular-price items, free delivery, and other great savings today on WIRED.

item.title: Microsoft Build 2025: What to expect, from Azure to Copilot upgrades

item.title: The EPA Will Likely Gut Team That Studies Health Risks From Chemicals
item.description: Reorganizations at the EPA may get rid of the agency’s fundamental program for research around the risks of toxic chemicals.

item.title: Improvements in ‘reasoning’ AI models may slow down soon, analysis finds
item.description: An analysis by Epoch AI, a nonprofit AI research institute, suggests the AI industry may not be able to eke massive performance gains out of reasoning...

item.title: A VIP Seat at Donald Trump’s Crypto Dinner Cost at Least $2 Million
item.description: The largest holders of Donald Trump’s memecoin have secured spots at a private event with the US president himself. WIRED tracked how they did it.
